Topic: How to Maximise Your Health Insurance Benefits?

Health insurance is a type of coverage that pays for medical and surgical expenses necessarily Incurred in hospital incurred by the insured individual.

It can provide financial protection by covering a portion or all of the costs associated with healthcare services, including hospitalization, doctor visits, prescription medications, and preventive care.

Health insurance can be obtained through private insurance companies, public sector employers, or government programs, depending on the country's healthcare system. It aims to mitigate the financial burden on account of unexpected medical expenses, ensuring individuals have access to necessary healthcare without facing exorbitant costs.
